tool_description: Extracts and structures nutritional information and ingredient lists from pet food product labels, packaging data, or manufacturer specifications.

product_name.description: Name of the pet food product to analyze

label_text.description: Raw text from product label including ingredients and guaranteed analysis

product_type.description: Type of pet food: dry, wet, raw, freeze-dried, or treats

error_messages: Invalid label text: Ensure label_text contains readable nutritional information and ingredient list
Unsupported product type: Use one of [dry, wet, raw, freeze-dried, treats]
Missing guaranteed analysis: Label text must include guaranteed analysis section with protein, fat, fiber, and moisture percentages
Incomplete ingredient list: Ensure ingredients are listed in descending order of weight
usage: Provide product_name, label_text, and product_type. Optionally include brand_name. The tool will extract and structure all nutritional data and ingredients from the label text.

product_id.description: Unique identifier for the parsed product

ingredients.description: List of ingredients in order of weight

calories_per_cup.description: Metabolizable energy per cup if available
